## luceneEscapeTerm() function

Escapes a term according to lucence syntax

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function luceneEscapeTerm(aTerm: string): string;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aTerm | <code>string</code> | term to escape |
